attributes.action: RIGHT TO BUY SCHEME IS ECO-SOCIO INEQUALITY AND DISCRIMINATES
attributes.additional_details:
BLATANT UNFAIRNESS AND INEQUALITY...................

  IT IS "UNFAIR" THAT SOCIAL TENANTS GET HELP FROM THE GOVERNMENT TO BUY A PROPERTY UNDER THE RIGHT TO BUY SCHEME.WITH MASSIVE DISCOUNTS FROM THE GOVERNMENT..........BUT PEOPLE THAT LIVE AT HOME WITH THEIR PARENTS OR PEOPLE IN PRIVATE RENTS DO NOT GET ANY HELP FROM THE GOVERNMENT WITH ANY TYPE OF MASSIVE DISCOUNTS
 PLEASE EXPLAIN THE DIFFERENCE WHY THE GOVERNMENT HELPS SOCIAL TENANTS TO BUY A PROPERTY WITH MASSIVE DISCOUNTS ..AND YET THE GOVERNMENT DOES NOT HELP THOSE PEOPLE SIMPLY LIVING AT HOME WITH THEIR PARENTS AND DO NOT GET MASSIVE DISCOUNTS?

 ACTION TO TAKE:...
 THE RIGHT TO BUY SCHEME SHOULD BE ABOLISHED SO THAT ALL PEOPLE LIVING IN  ALL TYPES OF RESIDENCE ARE TREATED ...."EQUALLY"  AND "FAIRLY" WHERE DISCOUNTS ARE GIVEN BY THE GOVERNMENT IN ORDER TO BUY A PROPERTY.
